Player History
Drafted in 4th round, 98th overall pick, by Arizona in 2006...
Injured on 7/8/2009 with a Sore Shoulder, out for 6 days...
Injured on 6/28/2012 with a Bruised Finger, out for 3 days...
Had first career hit on 5/29/2015, off Garrett Mock (SDN)...
Hit first career homerun on 8/19/2015, off Joseph Lathan (STL)...
Traded from Arizona to Kansas City on 4/1/2016 (Going to ARI: SS W. Bergolla. Going to KCA: 2B B. Camuñas)...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against Oakland on 4/22/2016...
Injured on 7/4/2018 with a Inflamed Groin Muscle, out for one week...
Traded from Kansas City to Atlanta on 4/12/2019 (Going to ATL: SS B. Camuñas. Going to KCA: 2B J. Kogut)...
Signed as a free agent by Pittsburgh on 2/11/2021 to a 2-year deal worth $2,000,000 per year...
Won Gold Glove Award at Shortstop in 2021...
Signed as a free agent by Kansas City on 2/12/2023 to a 2-year deal worth $608,000 per year...
Drove in 7 runs against Detroit on 4/28/2024...
